code: import"../css/Buddy.css";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{setModal,setBuddyList}from"../actions";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Buddy(props){const buddyListURL="/db/buddy";const dispatch=useDispatch();const buddyList=useSelector(state=>state.buddyList);async function removeBuddy(buddyId){const response=await axios.delete(buddyListURL+"/deleteById/",{params:{_id:buddyId}});if(response&&response.data)dispatch(setBuddyList(response.data));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buddy-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeBuddy(props._id),className:"remove-buddy-btn",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buddy-wrapper",onClick:()=>dispatch(setModal({name:props.name,imgURL:props.imgURL,description:props.description,_id:props._id})),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"buddy-img",src:props.imgURL,alt:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"buddy-name",children:props.name})]})]});}export default Buddy;
